# init(feature:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new map item request with the specified map feature.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(feature: MapFeature)
```

## Parameters

- **feature**: The [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapFeature] to use to initialize the map item request.

## Creating a request

- **init(mapItemIdentifier:)**: Create a request with a map item identifier.
- **init(mapFeatureAnnotation:)**: Creates a new map item request with the specified feature annotation.
